mapper.sql: id, activity_no, shop_no, name, begin_time, end_time, height_limit, status, join_type, activity_num, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by
mapper.update: update coupon_activity set enabled = #{enabled} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ct.id,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time FROM coupon_activity_coupon ct LEFT JOIN coupon t ON ct.coupon_id = t.id LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON ti.coupon_id = t.id AND ti.status = 1 WHERE ct.activity_id = #{activityId}

SELECT t.id,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,case when ct.id is null then 'false' else 'true' end selected FROM coupon t LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON ti.coupon_id = t.id AND ti.status = 1 LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_coupon ct ON ct.coupon_id = t.id AND ct.activity_id = #{q.id} WHERE 1=1 AND t.shop_no = #{q.shopNo}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')

SELECT t.id,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,ct.id activity_coupon_id FROM coupon_activity_coupon ct LEFT JOIN coupon t ON ct.coupon_id = t.id LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON ti.coupon_id = t.id AND ti.status = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ct.activity_id = #{q.id}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')
